definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: Introduction to Fluid Mechanics, International Student Version, 7th Edition.
sentences.chinese: 流体力学概论，国际学生版，第7版。

sentences.english: This paper has given magneto -hydrodynamic energy integration relationship at the condition of biadiabatical approximation.
sentences.chinese: 本文得出了双绝热近似的磁流体力学能量积分关系式。

sentences.english: And from a fluid mechanics standpoint, the Jabulani's also pretty interesting.
sentences.chinese: 而且，从流体力学的角度来看，普天同庆也很有趣。

sentences.english: There are many parallels between Cherenkov radiation and hydrodynamic shocks.
sentences.chinese: 切仑可夫辐射和流体力学冲击之间有许多共同点。

sentences.english: The pressure drop is one of the most important characteristics in hydrodynamics of high-gravity rotating bed.
sentences.chinese: 压降是超重力旋转床流体力学的重要特征之一。

sentences.english: International journal of engineering fluid mechanics .
sentences.chinese: 国际工程流体力学杂志。

sentences.english: The lattice Boltzmann method is a new kind of computational fluid dynamics method.
sentences.chinese: 格子波尔兹曼方法是一种新兴的计算流体力学方法。

sentences.english: This paper presents a new method for calculating linear fluid mechanics problems.
sentences.chinese: 本文用一种新的办法来计算流体力学线性问题。

sentences.english: JCPT tray with two holes on the tray deck showed best hydrodynamic and mass transfer performances.
sentences.chinese: 开两个孔的塔板显示出最好的流体力学和传质性能。

sentences.english: Fluid dynamics has a number of applications, from the bizarre to the mundane.
sentences.chinese: 流体力学有着非常多的应用，从奇形怪状的到平淡的。

sentences.english: Hydraulic and mass transfer behaviour of HTV tray were studied with simulated units in laboratory.
sentences.chinese: 在实验室模型上进行了流体力学和传质性能试验。
